title: Verify that whether we are able to create File size based policy for Web Category
custom_steps:
1.Login to Tenant UI
2.Click on RealTime Protection under policies
3.Select  any web category and select activity as Browse,Upload and Download
4.Click on Add Criteria & Constraints section
5.Select File constraints
6.Check whether file Size option is available to create the policy
custom_expected: File Size option should be available and end user should be able to create the policy
